main.name: Robert Graczyk
main.bio: Hi there! I am Robert Graczyk, Full-Stack Web Developer certified in the MERN stack. I have a passion for Frontend Development, but am capable of working on the Backend as well. When COVID-19 hit, I lost my previous job which forced me to consider a different Career path. Coding has always been something that has interested me, so I decided to take the leap and enroll in a Full-Stack Web Development program through Devmountain. I hope that my most Recent Works speak for themselves in regards to what I am capable of in this field. When you spend 12-14 hours a day for a few months on any given topic, that topic begins to become very clear. I have learned more in those 13 weeks than both my Highschool and College experiences combined. My problem solving skills and willingness to work together as a team would make me a good candidate for any company in need of a Junior Web Developer!

education.description: Fully immersive 13 week Web Development Bootcamp taught in the MERN stack.

work.title: Body Repairman
work.description: Performed tear down and inspection of vehicles while analyzing other conditions in need of repair. Replaced door skins, roof skins, quarter panels, etc.

testimonials.text: Certified in the MERN stack with a passion for Frontend Development. Well-versed in various technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, React.js, MongoDB and SQL. Looking for an opportunity to showcase my skills and create something meaningful.
